_header: Now to the honor of God and of the Blessed Virgin Mary so clean
_description: A treatise on Shrift — about 200 long irregular lines, sometimes falling into prose, interspersed with Latin

OxfStJohn94.First Lines:
Now to þe honur of god & of þe blessud uirgine marie so
                    cleneAnd of seint michael þe archangel and alle þe seintes of
                    heuen…
OxfStJohn94.Last Lines:
…Bot we moste do good dedes þer with for grace and for
                    forgifnes & mercyffor to deliuer vs from þe paynes of purgatory
                    Amen Amen
